parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. The end time must be later than the start time. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC. The maximum time range to query is 6 months.

parameters.name: Interval
parameters.description:
The statistical interval. Default value: day. Valid values:

*   hour: natural hour of the start and end time.
*   day: natural day of the start and end time.
*   week: natural week of the start and end time.
*   month: natural month of the start and end time.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC. The maximum time range to query is 6 months.

parameters.name: StorageClass
parameters.description:
The hierarchical storage type. Valid values:

*   Standard
*   IA
*   Archive
*   ColdArchive
*   SourceIA
*   SourceArchive
*   SourceColdArchive
*   Changing
*   SourceChanging
